remarks: The set of all elements whose complement is dominated by the base set is a filter.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Dec-2013.)  (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 2-Aug-2015.)
statement:
csdfil $p |- ( ( X e. dom card /\ _om ~<_ X ) -> { x e. ~P X | ( X \ x ) ~< X } e. ( Fil ` X ) ) $.
$d X x $.
